channel.title: 华尔街日报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪华尔街日报news的种子

item.title: 多米尼加共和国正在修建隔离墙，以阻止海地人进入，因为混乱正在席卷这个邻国。这是该国数百年来激烈分裂的最新阶段。
item.description:
The Dominican Republic is building a wall to keep out Haitians, as chaos engulfs the neighboring country. It’s the latest phase in centuries of bitter division there. https://t.co/PNLRlvXD7a https://t.co/PNLRlvXD7a

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 27, 2024

item.title: 对巴尔的摩大桥垮塌的安全调查将包括受污染的燃料是否是导致一艘巨型货轮失去动力并撞向大桥的原因之一
item.description:
A safety probe into the Baltimore bridge collapse will include whether contaminated fuel played a role in a giant cargo ship losing power and crashing into the span https://t.co/9cBLbaTqvo https://t.co/9cBLbaTqvo

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 27, 2024

item.title: 评论罗莎莉的第四张专辑 "Bite Down "是她最出色的一张专辑，她用坚韧而清晰的嗓音演唱了一系列朴实而充满活力的乡村摇滚歌曲。
item.description:
Review: "Bite Down," Rosali’s fourth album, is easily her best, bringing her tough but clear voice to a collection of earthy and energetic country-rock songs https://t.co/ylXsZQe16j https://t.co/ylXsZQe16j

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 27, 2024

item.title: 近 96% 的牙科保健师是女性。七分之六的律师是白人。律师助理、美发师和营养师的种族和民族构成与美国整体劳动力的构成非常接近。
item.description:
Almost 96% of all dental hygienists are women. Six out of seven lawyers are white. And the racial and ethnic makeup of paralegals, hairdressers and dietitians closely mirrors that of the overall U.S. workforce. https://t.co/9vcU8Jbwth https://t.co/9vcU8Jbwth

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 27, 2024

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：拜登政府正以激进的监管阻碍人工智能的创新。@tedcruz和Phil Gramm写道：这可能使美国无法在人工智能领域占据全球领先地位，也无法实现这种领先地位所带来的繁荣。
item.description:
From @WSJopinion: The Biden administration is impeding innovation in artificial intelligence with aggressive regulation. This could deny America global leadership in AI and the prosperity that leadership would bring, write @tedcruz and Phil Gramm. https://t.co/MEouYKXRcy

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 27, 2024

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：如果法院开始对食品及药物管理局的决定进行二次评判，将会延缓挽救生命的治疗方法的发展。无论您对堕胎持何种观点，米非司酮案都要求司法谦逊。
item.description:
From @WSJopinion: If courts start second-guessing FDA decisions, it will slow the development of life-saving treatments. The mifepristone case calls for judicial modesty, no matter your views on abortion. https://t.co/gxs60hXntU https://t.co/gxs60hXntU

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 27, 2024

item.title: 突发事件：巴尔的摩大桥垮塌后失踪的六人已被推定死亡，搜救工作已暂停
item.description:

item.title: 是否需要登机牌？行李是放在传送带上还是垃圾桶里？如今，你永远不知道在机场安检站会遇到什么。以下四条建议可以帮助您做好准备。
item.description:
Boarding pass, or no? Bags on the conveyor belt or in a bin? You never know what you're going to get at an airport security checkpoint these days. Here are four tips to help you stay prepared. https://t.co/7HGhpssqlf https://t.co/7HGhpssqlf

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：@gerardtbaker写道：一场史无前例的法律战似乎只给特朗普的支持者注入了活力，而对说服特朗普的怀疑者却收效甚微
item.description:

item.title: 每年五月，冰岛农民都会将羊群放归野外。然后，在冬季来临之前，社区会聚集在一起，将羊群收回并分类。算是欢迎游客吧。
item.description:
Each year in May, Iceland’s farmers release sheep into the wild. Then before winter, communities come together to retrieve and sort them. Tourists are welcome, sort of. https://t.co/zJIUXslYh2 https://t.co/zJIUXslYh2

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 26, 2024

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：@wjmcgurn 写道：特朗普的敌人们仍在努力寻找一种方式来应对一个总是愿意去别人不愿意去的地方的人
item.description:

item.title: 贝莱德首席执行官在年度信函中表示，人口老龄化正在给退休安全网带来压力，随着医学突破延长人们的寿命，这一问题将进一步恶化
item.description:
